result.execSummary:
The defendant AMBER R JUDD was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Narcotic Drugs, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).
  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Forfeiture and costs to be paid within 60 days from sentence date, unless payment plan is approved.  Penalty for non-payment shall be entry of civil judgment.   Clerk of Courts shall docket without fees.  Send payments to:  Clerk of Courts, Room 110, 415 Jackson Street, P O Box 2808, Oshkosh WI  54903-2808.

records.addlTxt: 2:31 pm Defendant AMBER R JUDD in court, in custody.  Attorney Trisha Janet Fritz in court for AMBER R JUDD.  Prosecuting attorney Tucker T. Tellefson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.  PSI waived.
Notice of Eligibility for Drug Court

11:47 AM Defendant AMBER R JUDD appeared by video from Ozaukee County Jail, in custody.  Attorney Trisha Janet Fritz appeared by video for AMBER R JUDD.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Jeanne Struve in court for the State of Wisconsin.  The DE is going to be accepted into the Drug Treatment Court in Winnebago County.  The Court will set a Plea/Sent prior to the DE release from Ozaukee  County Jail. Bond Continues. The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Pre-trial conference on August 29, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Defendant AMBER R JUDD in court with attorney Trisha Janet Fritz.  Defendant AMBER R JUDD in custody in WCJ.  Adam Joseph Levin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  AMBER R JUDD appeared by video means with Attorney. Victim rights complied with. Reading waived. Bond continues.  Defendant waives next appearance if  it is a plea and sentencing hearing.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 11:30 am.

10:46 AM Defendant AMBER R JUDD in court (via phone from Ozaukee County Jail) with attorney Trisha Janet Fritz.  Defendant AMBER R JUDD in custody.  Adam Joseph Levin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bond Continues.  The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.  Record closed @ 10:49.  Arraignment scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Ozaukee  County Jail 6/27 @ 10:45.  Not sent to transport.

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.   NO POSSESSION OR CONSUMPTION OF ILLEGAL CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES OR DRUG PARAPHERNALIA WITHOUT A VALID PRESCRIPTION.   You shall report for fingerprinting and photos pursuant to Wis Stats 970.02(7) to room 15, lower level of the Courthouse.  Due to COVID-19 you will need to call 920-236-4906 BEFORE reporting.

8:40 am-Defendant AMBER R JUDD appears via zoom with attorney Trisha Janet Fritz in court.  Defendant AMBER R JUDD in custody.  Eric Sparr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Advised of rights.  Given copy of complaint.  Bond set by Court.  Further proceedings scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 10:45 am. Record closed 8:43 am
Ozaukee Co. Jail 6/20 @ 8:30.  Not sent to transport.
